about.title: ‚≠ê About the Cookingdom Game
about.description1: The Cookingdom game is a super fun, relaxing casual cooking simulation that lets you experience the joy of cooking in a friendly, stress-free environment. It combines simple, intuitive controls with progressively challenging cooking tasks, making the Cookingdom game suitable for players of all ages.
about.description2: The core gameplay of the Cookingdom game involves completing the entire process from food prep to cooking and plating through a series of interactive mini-games. Whether it's chopping vegetables, stirring, controlling heat, or decorative plating, each step in the Cookingdom game is designed to be easy to learn and full of fun.
about.description3: As you advance through the levels in the Cookingdom game, you'll unlock new recipes, kitchen utensils, and decorations. You can freely customize your kitchen to create your personalized cooking space. The game features no strict time limits, encouraging you to enjoy the relaxing cooking process offered by the Cookingdom game at your own pace.

howToPlay.title: How to Play the Cookingdom Game

step1.title: What is the Cookingdom Game?
step1.description: The Cookingdom game is a relaxing and cozy cooking simulator that takes you on an unparalleled culinary adventure. By following these tips within the Cookingdom game, you'll quickly become an expert, impressing friends with your virtual culinary skills. Remember, the goal of the Cookingdom game is to enjoy the process, so have fun and let your creativity shine!

step2.title: Learning the Ropes
step2.description: When you first start the Cookingdom game, it provides easy-to-follow tutorials explaining how to perform each cooking task. These guides are designed to help you get familiar with the controls and game mechanics of the Cookingdom game. Pay attention to these initial guides.

step3.title: Completing Levels
step3.description: Each level in the Cookingdom game presents a specific dish you need to prepare. Follow the on-screen instructions, complete the mini-games for each step (chopping, mixing, baking, etc.), and aim for the best score. Success in the Cookingdom game is usually measured by accuracy and sometimes speed in the mini-games.

step4.title: Using Cookingdom Walkthrough Guides
step4.description: If you get stuck on a certain level or just want to optimize your cooking in the Cookingdom game, make use of the Cookingdom Walkthrough Guides provided on this site! We offer step-by-step instructions, tips for tricky mini-games, and video examples to help you master every recipe and achieve top scores with our Cookingdom all Level Walkthrough Guides.
step4.prompt: Check our comprehensive Cookingdom Walkthrough Guides for detailed help!

step5.title: Engaging with the Community
step5.description: Join the Cookingdom game community online! Share your kitchen designs, ask for help, and discuss strategies with fellow players of the Cookingdom game. Follow the links in our footer to join.

q1.question: Is the Cookingdom game free to play?
q1.answer: Yes, the Cookingdom game is free to download and play on both iOS and Android devices. It may offer optional in-app purchases for cosmetic items or minor boosts, but the core gameplay is accessible without spending money.

q2.question: Are the guides on this site official?
q2.answer: No, this is an unofficial fansite created by enthusiasts for the Cookingdom game. The guides and information are based on player experience and community knowledge. While we strive for accuracy, always refer to official Cookingdom game resources if needed.

q3.question: How often are the guides updated?
q3.answer: We aim to keep the guides updated with major Cookingdom game changes or new level releases. However, as a fan project, updates depend on volunteer time and community contributions. Check back regularly!

q4.question: Can I contribute to the guides?
q4.answer: We love community contributions! If you have tips, corrections, or video walkthroughs, please reach out through our contact page or social media links (Discord/Reddit in the footer). We'll review and credit contributions.

tips.title: üí° Cookingdom Game Tips & Tricks
tips.description: Master these Cookingdom game tips to make your kitchen career more efficient and achieve three-star ratings with ease! Applying these strategies will enhance your experience in the Cookingdom game. Consider checking our Cookingdom Walkthrough Guides for level-specific strategies.
tips.tip1_text: Faster stoves and larger pots can significantly reduce cooking time in the Cookingdom game.
tips.tip2_text: While waiting for one dish to finish, you can prepare ingredients for the next one.
tips.tip3_text: Completing orders quickly and accurately earns more tips and good reviews in the Cookingdom game.
tips.tip4_text: Place frequently used equipment in convenient locations for efficient workflow in the Cookingdom game.
tips.tip5_text: Events often offer generous rewards to help you level up faster.

privacy.title: Cookingdom Guide Fansite Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: Thank you for visiting the Cookingdom Guide Fansite (hereinafter "the Site"). We value your privacy highly and are committed to protecting your personal information. Please read the following privacy policy carefully to understand how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal data.

section1.title: 1. Personal Information We Collect
section1.p1: When you visit the Site, we may collect the following types of personal information: Automatically collected technical information: Such as your IP address, browser type, device type, operating system version, access times, etc. This information is collected automatically through Cookies and similar technologies to improve our services and user experience.
section1.p2: Information voluntarily provided by users: When you register an account, subscribe to newsletters, participate in discussions, or provide feedback on the Site, we may collect information such as your email address, username, message content, etc.

section2.title: 2. Use of Information
section2.intro: The information we collect is primarily used for the following purposes:
section2.b1: Providing services and support: To provide you with game guides, news updates, technical support, and other services based on your requests.
section2.b2: Personalizing experience: To provide customized content and recommendations based on your interests and preferences.
section2.b3: Improving website functionality: To analyze user behavior, improve website design and features, and enhance user experience.
section2.b4: Marketing and communication: To send you game-related updates, offers, promotions, and other information via email or other channels (if you consent to receive them).

section3.title: 3. How We Protect Your Information
section3.p1: We implement appropriate technical and administrative measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, disclosure, or alteration. These measures include data encryption, access control, and regular security reviews.

section4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section4.intro: We do not sell or rent your personal information to third parties. We only share your information in the following circumstances:
section4.b1: Service Providers: We may share your information with third parties who provide technical support, website hosting, and other services. These service providers are limited to providing services for us and are required to adhere to confidentiality obligations.
section4.b2: Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law or legal process.

section5.title: 5. Use of Cookies
section5.p1: We use Cookies and similar technologies to collect and store your preferences, browsing habits, and other information. You can disable Cookies through your browser settings, but please note that this may affect your ability to use some features of the Site.

section6.title: 6. Third-Party Links
section6.p1: The Site may contain links to other websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices of these third-party websites. We recommend that you review their privacy policies when visiting other sites.

section7.title: 7. Children's Privacy
section7.p1: Our services are not directed to children under the age of 13. If we discover that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child under 13, we will promptly take steps to delete the relevant information.

section8.title: 8. Your Rights
section8.p1: In accordance with relevant laws and regulations, you have the right to request access to, correct, or delete the personal information we have collected about you. If you have any questions or requests regarding the processing of your personal information, please contact us using the contact information below.

section9.title: 9. Contact Us
section9.p1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or need more information, please contact us via the following method:

terms.title: Cookingdom Guide Fansite Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to the Cookingdom Guide Fansite (hereinafter "the Site"). Before accessing or using the services provided by the Site, please read the following terms of service carefully. Accessing or using the Site signifies your agreement to comply with these terms. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Site.

section1.title: 1. Service Content
section1.p1: The Site provides guides, tips, update information, community discussions, user reviews, and related content for the "Cookingdom" game. We are dedicated to providing players with high-quality game resources and support to help enhance their gaming experience.

section2.title: 2. User Account
section2.p1: To fully utilize certain features of the Site, you may need to create an account. When registering, you agree to provide accurate and complete personal information and to update this information promptly to maintain its accuracy. You are responsible for the security of your account and password and agree not to share your account information with any third party.

section3.title: 3. User Conduct
section3.intro: When using the Site, you agree to:
section3.b1: Not post content that violates laws, regulations, or is unethical (including but not limited to malware, advertisements, spam, harassing messages, content infringing on others' copyright or privacy rights).
section3.b2: Respect the rights of other users and not interfere with the normal operation of the Site.
section3.b3: Not obtain content, data, or systems of the Site through any illegal means.
section3.p1: If you violate these conduct guidelines, the Site reserves the right to suspend or terminate your account and take necessary legal action.

section4.title: 4. Content Use
section4.p1: All content provided on the Site (including text, images, videos, audio, etc.) is the property of the Site or its licensors and is protected by copyright law. Without authorization from the Site, you may not copy, distribute, modify, display, or sell the Site's content in any form.
section4.p2: Users may access and use the Site's content for non-commercial purposes in compliance with these Terms of Service, but any commercial use of the content requires prior explicit permission from the Site.

section5.title: 5. Intellectual Property
section5.p1: All logos, trademarks, service marks, etc., related to the Site are the intellectual property of the Site or its licensors. Without authorization from the Site, you may not use or copy this intellectual property in any form.

section6.title: 6. Service Interruption and Termination
section6.p1: The Site may temporarily interrupt service for maintenance, updates, or other reasons. We will make reasonable efforts to notify users in advance but assume no liability for any consequences arising from service interruptions. The Site reserves the right to modify, suspend, or terminate part or all of its services at any time without prior notice.

section7.title: 7. Third-Party Websites
section7.p1: The Site may contain links to other websites operated by third parties. We have no control over the content or privacy policies of these websites and therefore assume no responsibility for their content and privacy practices. We recommend that you carefully read their terms of service and privacy policies when visiting these sites.

section8.title: 8. Disclaimer
section8.p1: The Site makes its best effort to ensure the accuracy and completeness of the content provided but makes no express or implied warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or completeness of any content. We assume no liability for any direct or indirect losses resulting from the use of the Site's content.

section9.title: 9. User Data and Privacy
section9.p1: The collection, use, and protection of your personal data are detailed in our Privacy Policy. Please carefully read our Privacy Policy and agree to its terms before using the Site's services.

section10.title: 10. Governing Law and Dispute Resolution
section10.p1: These Terms of Service are governed by the laws of the People's Republic of China. Any disputes arising from or related to these terms shall be submitted to the court with jurisdiction in the location of the Site for adjudication.

section11.title: 11. Modification of Terms
section11.p1: The Site reserves the right to modify or update these Terms of Service at any time. The modified terms become effective once published. Your continued use of the Site's services signifies your acceptance of the modified terms. We recommend that you periodically review this page to stay informed about the latest terms of service.

section12.title: 12. Contact Us
section12.p1: If you have any questions about these Terms of Service or need more information, please contact us via the following method:
